author: slessard
msg: MYFACES-2016 : Implement new contract for UIComponent.getChildren() List

author: jukka
msg: JCR-1171: Contribute Pluggable Permission and User Management to Jackrabbit

Moved the o.a.j.commons.iterator.AccessControlPolicyIteratorAdapter class to o.a.j.core.security as it is only accessed from there and we currently (before JSR 283 is final) can't put the class in jcr-commons.
With this change all jackrabbit-core classes are included in o.a.j.core, which makes things easier to track.

author: jukka
msg: Restore a simple repository-level namespace cache.
Personally I think this kind of caching should be up to a remoting layer to implement if needed. But as discussed in JCR-1612 I'm restoring caching functionality for now.

author: slessard
msg: Fix to IOException unwrapping in encodeChildren
